fields.Title of Presentation: Insights About Building Connections from Human Rights Advocacy
fields.Description/Abstract: This event was planned by President’s Office, the CTL,  the Student Involvement and Leadership Center, with input from others, to provide  a space for students to gather and engage in a conversation on current events, the presidential election, and the role of the university in facilitating civil discourse and dialogue. I was one of the faculty panelists and small-group faciliators.
